name: EZ4u
description:
EZ4u is a hardcore platformer, where the man named Boris was absorbed by the strange green artifact. He have to complete 23 levels, which will surprise you with incredible difficulty. Will Boris be able to get out from this trap? Let's try.

Features:
-23 levels
-6 chapters consist of 23 levels
-23 most difficult levels of your life
-Boss-level
